NK001(ka)002:0: skyabs 'gro yan lag drug pa dang bdun cu pa'i
NK001(ka)002:1: chos kyi bdag po rnams la gsol 'debs brgyud ldan
NK001(ka)002:2: bla ma'i byin rlabs dpal ster zhes bya ba bzhugs
NK001(ka)002:3: so // na mo gu ra we /
NK001(ka)002:4: bskal pa bzang por lung rtogs chos 'khor ches //
NK001(ka)002:5: srid gsum zhi bar 'dren mdzad bzhi pa ru //
NK001(ka)002:6: mngon bsgyur bstan pa'i bdag po sh+aakya'i rgyal //
NK001(ka)002:7: . sras spyan ras gzigs dbang 'phags yul gyi //
NK001(ka)002:8: pan chen zla bral bi ma mi tra'i zhabs //
NK001(ka)002:9: lo chen dz+ny+aa na ku m+aar gsol ba 'debs //
NK001(ka)002:10: gang gi thugs sras tshogs las rnam gsum lugs //
NK001(ka)002:11: a ro las brgyud khams lugs zhes grags dang //
NK001(ka)002:12: mchog rab gzhon nu las brgyud nyang lugs dang //
NK001(ka)002:13: sog po dpal ye las brgyud rong lugs te //
NK001(ka)002:14: de las gnubs dang zur chen sh+aakya 'byung //
NK001(ka)002:15: zur chung shes rab grags la gsol ba 'debs //
NK001(ka)002:16: ka ba bzhi dang gsang bdag sgro phug pa //
NK001(ka)002:17: gang gi slob bu gdugs thogs stong gi nang /
NK001(ka)002:18: thugs zin slob ma bcu gnyis sogs brgyud dang //
NK001(ka)002:19: gzhan yang kun mkhyen rong zom las brgyud pa'i //
NK001(ka)002:20: chu bo kun 'dus grub chen thang stong rgyal //
NK001(ka)002:21: 'gos lo gzhon nu dpal la gsol ba 'debs //
NK001(ka)002:22: yab rje 'jam dbyangs rin chen rgyal mtshan zhabs //
NK001(ka)002:23: mnga' ris pan chen rin chen phun tshogs dang //
NK001(ka)002:24: rtse le rig 'dzin sna tshogs rang grol sogs //
NK001(ka)002:25: gzhan phan mtha' yas bar du brgyud gyur pa //
NK001(ka)002:26: skyabs 'gro yan lag drug pa'i brgyud rim du //
NK001(ka)002:27: legs bzhugs dam pa rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK001(ka)002:28: gzhan yang skyabs 'gro bdun cu'i brgyud pa'i rim //
NK001(ka)002:29: bstan pa'i bdag po nyid las 'jam dpal dbyangs //
NK001(ka)002:30: 'phags pa klu sgrub slob dpon zla ba grags //
NK001(ka)002:31: rig pa'i khu byug ku s+aa la che chung //
NK001(ka)002:32: a ti sha dang thang dza a b+h+ya kar //
NK001(ka)002:33: zla rgyal gro lung pa la gsol ba 'debs //
NK001(ka)002:34: byang chub 'od rma sh+aakya seng+ge dang //
NK001(ka)002:35: nam mkha' grags dang smon tshul byang chub grub //
NK001(ka)002:36: gzhon nu rdo rje kun mkhyen chos rje'i zhabs //
NK001(ka)002:37: khyab gdal lhun grub bde legs rgya mtsho dang //
NK001(ka)002:38: bya bral chos rje 'jam dbyangs grags pa 'o. //
NK001(ka)002:39: sangs rgyas dbon po rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK001(ka)002:40: ldan sgom chos grags shes rab rgya mtsho dang //
NK001(ka)002:41: thugs sras zla grags sogs la rnying brgyud dang //
NK001(ka)002:42: rang byung rdo rje nyid las brgyud pa dang /
NK001(ka)002:43: mkhas pa bu ston nyid las legs brgyud pa //
NK001(ka)002:44: kun 'dus rgyal sras gzhan phan mtha' yas dang //
NK001(ka)002:46: skyabs 'gro spyi yi bshad brgyud kun dang ldan //
NK001(ka)002:47: slob dpon gnyis kyi gzhung mchog lung gi rgyun //
NK001(ka)002:48: zam ma chad par rnyed cing rnam bshad la //
NK001(ka)002:49: byin rlabs spobs thob dpal gyi seng+gera bcas //
NK001(ka)002:50: gsol btab dbang gis chos mchog skyabs 'gro la //
NK001(ka)002:51: bshad nyan sgom sgrub phun sum tshogs 'phel shog /
NK001(ka)002:52: skyabs 'gro'i dngos dang brgyud pa'i nyer len can //
NK001(ka)002:53: brdar btags chos nyid dag las 'thob pa yi //
NK001(ka)002:54: skyabs 'gro'i lam gyis tshogs gnyis mthar phyin te //
NK001(ka)002:55: 'bras bu'i skyabs gnas rdzogs sangs rgyas 'thob shog /
